page.title: 16VILLAGE FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: The{state school}in Marsh Gibbon is now the only school in the block,the school in Charndon having closed in 1982 due to a drop in pupil numbers.The school caters for children between{5-9 years,}starting as rising fives.At 9 years the children are bussed to a combined school in a village 3 miles away although many transfer to private schools in other areas. The school is divided into{three {classes.}The buildings comprise a hall which is also the dining room,a kitchen,2 classrooms,an office and a temporary classroom. There is also a swimming pool.The school has been on its present site for about{18 years although there has been a school in the village for over{140 years. The school has an active{P.T.A.}which has raised money for many items.
